<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们知道，不同肤色的人外貌差别很大，而双胞胎的辨识很难。有意思的是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1994</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">年期间，用于通过万维网冲浪和交换数据的早期技术的简单性和有效性有助于将其移植到许多不同的操作系统，并将其用于科学组织和大学，然后传播到行业。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器的主要功能是存储，处理和传递网页给客户。客户端和服务器之间的通信使用超文本传输协议（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">）进行。交付的页面最常见的是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTML</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文档，除了文本内容之外，还可能包含图像，样式表和脚本。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>

mso-font-kerning:0pt">、如果与服务器的会话还没建立，此时先建立</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">TCP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">连接，并完成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">协商（确定双方均可接受的处理方式，包括协议版本，是否加密，内容格式等等）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">、用户代理把请求内容封装成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">数据包向服务器发送。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">、服务器接收到资源请求并以之前协商好的方式解包并处理。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">6</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">、服务器请求的资源封装成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">数据包并返回给用户代理。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">监听模块</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器监听某个端口（一般默认是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">8080</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">端口，用户可以设置其他端口），以建立和用户代理之间的连接。一旦建立连接，用户代理的后续</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">请求将不用再进入监听模块。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序开发框架（含运行环境，比如解释执行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">JSP,Web API</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">），这个框架解决鲁棒性，可靠性问题，提供快速开发接口。换言之，开发人员只需要专注于实现业务本身，如有更高的需求还可以对框架进行定制和扩展。这个框架的另外一个名字是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CICS</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的主机应用管理和监控环境衍生而来的。大部分的这些产品都指定了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">封闭的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">产品专用通信协议来互连胖客户机</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(“fat”
client)</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和服务器。在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">90</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">年代，这些传统的应用服务器产品开始嵌入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">通信功能，刚开始要利用网关来实现。不久后它们之间的界线开始变得模糊了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器越来越成熟，可以处理更高的负载、更多的并发和拥有更好的特性；应用服务器开始添加越来越多的基于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">HTTP</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的通信功能。所有的这些导致了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器与应用服务器的界线变得更窄了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 19.2pt; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">反向代理是代理服务器的一种。它根据客户端的请求，从后端的服务器（如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器）上获取资源，然后再将这些资源返回给客户端。与前向代理不同，前向代理作为一个媒介将互联网上获取的资源返回给相关联的客户端，而反向代理是在服务器端（如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Web</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">服务器）作为代理使用，而不是客户端。客户端通过前向代理可以访问很多不同的资源，而反向代理是很多客户端都通过它访问不同后端服务器上的资源，而不需要知道这些后端服务器的存在，而以为所有资源都来自于这个反向代理服务器。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Times New Roman";color:#3E3E3E;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
